problem_text_cn: 如图,一把带有60°角的三角尺放在两条平行线间,已知量得平行线间的距离为12cm,三角尺最短边和平行线成45°角,则三角尺斜边的长度为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, a triangle ruler with an angle of N_0 is placed between two parallel lines, and the distance between the parallel lines is known to be N_1. The shortest edge of the triangle ruler and the parallel line form an angle of N_2, then the length of the hypotenuse of the triangle ruler for()
